    private static final class DefaultEntry<K, V> implements Map.Entry<K, V> {
        private final K key;
        private final V value;

        @Override // java.util.Map.Entry
        public K getKey() {
            return this.key;
        }

        @Override // java.util.Map.Entry
        public V getValue() {
            return this.value;
        }

        DefaultEntry(K k, V v) {
            this.key = k;
            this.value = v;
        }
